issue.title: [Developer] Install locally a new enough version of Go for release verification script
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7733](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7733). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This will ensure that if a developer has a too-old version of Go installed on their system that the release verification will still work

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7733?focusedCommentId=17066983) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6710
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6710>
